thread.title: Mary Ernst
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Mary Ernst

author: Mary Ernst
title: Mary Ernst
text: The sheets are beautiful, and came in a timely fashion. Unfortunately, I had to return them (unused of course) because they require dry cleaning. They can be washed in cold water, but not dryed in dryer. I also have some pillow cases my husband gave me for Christmas---monogrammed--and they are good for my hair to reduce static and tangles.
